<!-- Thin announcement strip (sticks under navbar) -->
<div class="ann-strip" role="status" aria-live="polite">

    <span class="ann-dot" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    <span class="ann-text">News page is coming soon!</span>
    <a class="ann-link" href="news.html">Preview Page ‚Üí</a>
  </div>
  <button class="ann-toggle" aria-label="Collapse announcement" title="Collapse">‚ñæ</button>
</div>

<button class="ann-tab" aria-label="Show announcement" hidden>üì£ News</button>

<style>
.ann-strip{
  margin:6px 0 14px;padding:.38rem .75rem;
  display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:.8rem;
  background:#f7faff;border-bottom:1px solid #e6eefc;
  color:#0b2e66;font:500 .95rem/1.25 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  overflow:hidden;max-height:44px;transition:max-height .28s ease,opacity .28s ease;opacity:1;position:relative;z-index:5;
}
.ann-inner{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:.6rem}
.ann-dot{width:.5rem;height:.5rem;border-radius:50%;background:#0d6efd;box-shadow:0 0 0 4px rgba(13,110,253,.12)}
.ann-link{font-weight:600;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:1px dashed #7aa4ff}
.ann-link:hover{border-bottom-color:transparent}
.ann-strip.is-collapsed{max-height:0;opacity:0;border-bottom-color:transparent;margin-bottom:0}
.ann-toggle{position:absolute;right:10px;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);border:0;background:transparent;cursor:pointer;font-size:1rem;line-height:1;color:#5c728a;opacity:.7}
.ann-toggle:hover{opacity:1}
.ann-tab{position:sticky;top:8px;margin-left:auto;float:right;padding:.3rem .55rem;border-radius:999px;border:1px solid #e0e8ff;background:#f6f9ff;color:#0b2e66;font:600 .88rem/1 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;box-shadow:0 6px 18px rgba(13,110,253,.12)}
.ann-tab:hover{background:#fff}
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
  .ann-strip{background:#0f2340;border-bottom-color:#213a66;color:#d7e6ff}
  .ann-link{border-bottom-color:#5b86ff}
  .ann-toggle{color:#b8c9ff}
  .ann-tab{background:#0f2340;color:#d7e6ff;border-color:#2b4875}
}
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const KEY='ann_strip_collapsed_v1';
  const strip=document.querySelector('.ann-strip');
  const toggleBtn=strip.querySelector('.ann-toggle');
  const tab=document.querySelector('.ann-tab');

  function collapse(persist=true){ strip.classList.add('is-collapsed'); tab.hidden=false; persist&&localStorage.setItem(KEY,'1'); }
  function expand(persist=true){ strip.classList.remove('is-collapsed'); tab.hidden=true; persist&&localStorage.setItem(KEY,'0'); }

  const forceShow=new URLSearchParams(location.search).get('showAnn')==='1';
  const saved=localStorage.getItem(KEY);
  if (forceShow || saved!=='1'){ expand(false); } else { collapse(false); }

  toggleBtn.addEventListener('click',()=>collapse(true));
  tab.addEventListener('click',()=>expand(true));
})();
</script>
